name: Atlantis Spa Suite
description: Atlantis Spa Suites combine hotel luxury with spa-level indulgence. Each suite features an in-room jetted Jacuzzi tub, separate living area, floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic views, 55-inch HDTV, Bose Wave Radio, and premium June Jacobs bath products. Spa Suite guests receive access to the 25th-floor Concierge Lounge, including complimentary breakfast, afternoon hors d'oeuvres, and evening cocktails. Spa Atlantis — Reno's only Forbes Travel Guide Four-Star spa — is located within the resort and offers preferential booking for suite guests.
shortDescription: Suite with in-room Jacuzzi tub, separate living area, and access to Reno's only Forbes Four-Star spa.

faqs.question: Does the Spa Suite include spa access?
faqs.answer: Spa Atlantis is a Forbes Four-Star spa located within the resort. Spa Suite guests receive preferential booking access; treatments are priced separately.

faqs.question: What is the difference between the Spa Suite and Executive Spa Suite?
faqs.answer: The Executive Spa Suite is larger with expanded panoramic views and premium butler-level service. Both include the Jacuzzi tub and Concierge Lounge access.

testimonials.quote: Book spa slots early — they fill up fast, especially on weekends. Upper-floor suites have panoramic views that make the upgrade worth it.
testimonials.author: KAYAK reviewer

meta.title: Atlantis Spa Suite – Jacuzzi & Forbes Four-Star Spa Access | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Atlantis Spa Suites in Reno feature in-room Jacuzzi tubs, Concierge Lounge access, and proximity to the only Forbes Four-Star spa in Northern Nevada.
